## NotifyArguments interface

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface NotifyArguments
```

## Properties

| Property                                                                    | Modifiers | Type                                                 | Description                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                |
| --------------------------------------------------------------------------- | --------- | ---------------------------------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ |
| [description?](./extensions.notifyarguments.description.md)                 |           | string                                               | _(Optional)_ Detailed notification message.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                |
| [showInMessageCenter?](./extensions.notifyarguments.showinmessagecenter.md) |           | boolean                                              | _(Optional)_ Option to store notification in Message Center.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |
| [title](./extensions.notifyarguments.title.md)                              |           | string                                               | Notification's title.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |
| [type](./extensions.notifyarguments.type.md)                                |           | [NotificationType](./extensions.notificationtype.md) | <p>Type defines styling of the message.</p><p>Depending on intention of the message one of the values can be used: - <code>error</code> - in cases error occurred, operation failed. - <code>info</code> - general information for the user. - <code>success</code> - report about success of the operation. - <code>warning</code> - information that user needs to pay attention to.</p> |
